summary: This module defines a database migration that adds a collection for application environment revisions, provides utilities to generate revision documents for existing environments during an upgrade and to delete them on rollback, and includes a model for linking image assets to specific application variants.
business_intent: Ensure seamless data transition when moving from version 0.10.0 to 0.11.0 by automatically creating necessary revision records, preserving consistency, and allowing clean removal of those records if the migration is reversed, while also supporting image variant metadata management.
